events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a full refund as soon as possible.
The system has categorized the reported issue under the Refund cluster due to customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to this case to assist the customer with the refund process for the incorrect item shipment.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the wrong item you received. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue quickly?
Here is my order number 123456789 and attached is a clear photo of the item that arrived, which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation once it is done.
I appreciate your quick response and the prompt refund offer. Thank you for resolving this so smoothly.
The refund has been successfully processed and should appear in your bank account in 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can help you with today.
Since the refund was confirmed received and all concerns addressed, we are now closing this case. Thank you!
